mapper.sql: id, name, des,ac_code,year ,month, day, location, image, price, enrollment, participant, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into active(id, name, des,ac_code, year, month, day, location, image, price) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{des},#{acCode}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{location}, #{image},#{price})
mapper.select: select from active where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
select from active where ac_code = #{acCode} and is_deleted = 0

select * from active
and name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and des like concat('%',#{des},'%')
and is_deleted = 0
order by create_time desc
